title: Blouse, 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, rayon
Technique: reverse appliqué
description: On a backing of black cotton, cut-out cottons with red predominating, outline large chunky bird with tree, and scattered angular shapes. This forms body of blouse and is sewn on to yoke of mustard-colored rayon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blouse, 20th century.
20th century. Medium: cotton, rayon
Technique: reverse appliqué. Gift of Mrs. John Winslow. 1960-58-2.
